text: Gas-s-s-s (on-screen title: Gas! -Or- It Became Necessary to Destroy the World in Order to Save It.) is a 1970 American science fiction black comedy movie directed by Roger Corman and starring Robert Corff, Elaine Giftos, Cindy Williams, Bud Cort, Talia Shire and George Armitage. It was distributed by American International Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 comedy- drama movies Category:1970s science fiction movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Corman Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in New Mexico Category:Movies set in Alaska Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:American independent movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:American satirical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies
title: Gas-s-s-s
